text:
@realDonaldTrump @TheRickWilson @Twitter Truth hurts don’t it?
Now your brainless 🐑 cult can see it too

Buwahahahahahaha

You also lies to them about the mask

You have any idea how many of your base will suffer #Covid19?

In 2-4 weeks the evidence will be written in thier blood

100,000 and counting all deaths on you https://t.co/hNyDOHangy
